channel.title: A rollback of a server
channel.description:
hey everyone i was just wondering if you might have some answers.
Scenario: Server is online and a character gets kicked then when they logg back on the find that items they have got in the last 10 minutes are no longer there or if they trade items to another character they now have the items on both characters.
Question: What causes this to happen because there is no errors. Easyrsc.

item.title: A rollback of a server
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

Could be multiple causes, my first reply was the obvious issue.
From there you should be asking yourself

Did I ::kick the player
Did the server shut down?
Did I shut down the server?
Was everyone logged off?

Idk what the issue is but when you said kick, I thought of the command. Needs more detail.

Read full topic

item.title: A rollback of a server
item.dc:creator: @Vibes Vibes
item.description:
@Vibes wrote:

[quote=“waj, post:4, topic:438979”]Not to sound like an idiot but if you can’t fix simple things like this you wouldn’t even be trying to host a server.

Clearly you’re source is not saving account data when they are logged out, how hard would that be to figure out?.. common sense bro.[/quote]
I understand that , but the actual question I was trying to ask was what causes the server to do it. I didnt state it clear before, but i think it is from no junk dumping and it overloads the server which causes it to lagg and random rollbacks.

Read full topic

item.title: A rollback of a server
item.dc:creator: @amfg amfg
item.description:
@amfg wrote:

[quote=“waj, post:4, topic:438979”]Not to sound like an idiot but if you can’t fix simple things like this you wouldn’t even be trying to host a server.

Clearly you’re source is not saving account data when they are logged out, how hard would that be to figure out?.. common sense bro.[/quote]

It’s not like there are many skilled people left… it’s good that someone who isn’t Kryptix or Jagex is at least trying to host a RSC server.

Read full topic

item.title: A rollback of a server
item.dc:creator: @Vibes Vibes
item.description:
@Vibes wrote:

Rodgerwilco:

The method for saving player data was never called.

thank you for your response, another thing what causes a server to actually lag a character out and then when they logg on the server is rolled back?

Read full topic
